about_the_game:
Cosmic PANIC is an arcade style chaotic party game for one to four players. Choose a unique character in the Cosmic PANIC universe to duke it out or team up with your friends in a variety of arcade style games! Will your friends survive or thrive in the chaos?

ARCADE VARIETY

Engage in a variety of Cosmic PANIC twisted arcade style game types! Set high scores as you run from monstrous blobs, or race around the arcade to collect the most points in platforming style gameplay. Survive the pull of the wormhole, blast through portals, and defend the space station in top-down space adventuring gameplay. And dodge asteroids and chase down energy crystals to thrive in 3D space flight style gameplay. There's a chaotic mix of gameplay styles to challenge everyone!

CHALLENGING GAMEPLAY, SIMPLE CONTROLS

All game types are crafted to be arcade-friendly with simple controls, and the gameplay is increasingly challenging. To really set the highest of scores, you will need to survive AND thrive long enough to persist through environment changes and/or boss encounters each game type offers as the difficulty ramps up.

TEAMSIZE HIGHSCORE CHARTS

High score charts are separated by team sizes: 1, 2, 3, and 4 players. Play solo or together to top the charts and leave your mark.

COLLECT TICKETS AND GET PRIZES

As you play a variety of arcade games you will earn tickets to spend at the prize counter. Purchase decorations and new arcade cabinets to retrofit your private arcade room and unlock new playable games for single and multiplayer.
